options.content:
# Read Me 

### Search  Metrics 
#### This dashboard provides the following informations :
* __Search advance metrics__
 * __Update Metrics__ : End to end overview of indexing pipeline
   * __execute__ : Comprising the time spent to actually execute the index update on Lucene.
   * __prepare__ : Comprising the time spent preparing the actual index update.
   * __queue__ : Comprising the time spent by the index update task into the index pool.
   * __write__ : Comprising the time spent to convert the search document and write it into the database (Available only for http)
 *__Merge Metrics__ : Lucene segment merges
   * __warm__ : How long it takes to warm up segments to speed up cold queries.
   * __init__ : How long it takes to initialize the merge process.
   * __execute__ : How long it takes to execute the merge process.
 * __Query Metrics__ : Queries into the index
   * __retrieve__   : Time spent by a node to retrieve a single row from the database
   * __coordinate__ : Time spent by the coordinator node to distribute the query and gather/process results from shard
   * __execute__    : Time spent by a single shard to execute the actual Lucene index query 
   * __enqueue__ : Comprises the time spent by a query request waiting for a thread to execute. (Available in 6.x)
 *__Commit Metrics__ : Flushing indexpool and Executing commit on RAM buffer
   * __flush__ : Comprising the time spent by flushing the async indexing queue.
   * __execute__ : Comprising the time spent by actually executing the commit on the index.

 *  __Search Index Pool Metrics__: For 6.x versions IndexPool Metrics are only useful while Reindexing
   * __BackPressure Pause Nanos__ : The last backpressure pause
   * __Processed Tasks__ :  A running total of all indexing tasks (Added irate, so value shows in graph is incremental)
   * __Incoming/Outgoing Rate__ : Incoming/Outgoing Indexing Partition and Row tasks per minute
   * __Queue Size__ : Partition and Row indexing tasks combined 
   * __Reindex %__ : Reindex Progress
   * __Task Processing time Nanos__ : Last or currently processing task time
 *__Stall Metrics__ : Index workers stolen for Lucene flushing and merging (Not avaialable from DSE 6.x version)	 
   * __flush__
   * __merge__
